system.description:
This spell allows the caster to move large quantities of soil (but not rock) within a range of 240'. The spell moves soil at a rate of 60' per turn.

Effects:

  • Soil can be moved horizontally to create hills, embankments, or barriers.
  • Soil can be moved vertically to create a pit or trench up to 240' deep (unless stopped by bedrock).
  • Once moved, the soil remains in place permanently at the end of the spellâ€™s duration.

Uses:

  • Construct fortifications or reshape landscapes.
  • Create defensive barriers or block paths.
  • Excavate trenches or tunnels for tactical purposes.
